sentences.en: "I'm afraid he's ill." — "I'm sorry to hear that."
sentences.cn: “恐怕他生病了。”——“真是遗憾。”

sentences.en: "I'm sorry," she said. "I have plans for tonight."
sentences.cn: “抱歉，”她说，“我今晚有安排了。”

sentences.en: "Oh, sorry. I forgot." — "Everyone forgets," the girl sighed.
sentences.cn: “哦，对不起，我忘了。”——“每个人都有忘事的时候，”那女孩叹着气说道。

sentences.en: "Sorry Edward," I said, splattering the cloth with jam.
sentences.cn: “对不起，爱德华，”我说道，因为我把果酱洒在了桌布上。

sentences.en: "We're all talking at the same time." — "Yeah. Sorry."
sentences.cn: “我们俩在同时讲话。”——“噢，抱歉。”

sentences.en: After a pause Alex said sharply: "I'm sorry if I've upset you"
sentences.cn: 歇了一会儿后，亚历克斯毫不客气地说：“要是让你心烦了，那我很抱歉。”

sentences.en: Hum, I am sorry but I thought you were French.
sentences.cn: 嗯，很抱歉，我以为你是法国人。

sentences.en: I'm sorry to call so late, but I need a favour.
sentences.cn: 这么晚打电话真是抱歉，可是我需要帮个忙。

sentences.en: I'm sorry to have to tell you that Janet West is dead.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我不得不告诉您，珍妮特·韦斯特已经不在人世。

sentences.en: I'm sorry, I don't know what came over me.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我不知道自己是怎么回事。

sentences.en: I'm sorry. That was a hateful thing to say.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我不该说那么难听的话。

sentences.en: I’ve got no sympathy for him, but I feel sorry for his wife.
sentences.cn: 我并不同情他，但我为他妻子感到惋惜。

sentences.en: It’s a sorry state of affairs when an old lady has to wait 12 hours to see a doctor.
sentences.cn: 一个老太太看病要等上12个小时，这情形很可悲。

sentences.en: John, I'm sorry for Steve, but I think you've made the right decisions.
sentences.cn: 约翰，我为史蒂夫感到难过，但是我认为你的决定是正确的。

sentences.en: She was very sorry about all the trouble she'd caused.
sentences.cn: 她对自己造成的麻烦感到很内疚。

sentences.en: The fire left Kuwait's oil industry in a sorry state.
sentences.cn: 这场大火使科威特的石油产业陷入悲惨的境地。

sentences.en: the sorry sight of so many dead animals
sentences.cn: 大量动物尸体的悲惨景象

sentences.en: the sorry state of the environment
sentences.cn: 糟糕的环境状况

sentences.en: This whole sorry episode (= bad thing that happened ) shows just how incompetent the government has become.
sentences.cn: 这一可悲事件反映出政府变得多么无能。

sentences.en: This, I am sorry to say, is almost entirely wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 我很遗憾，这几乎完全是一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.en: Turkin tapped him on the shoulder. "Sorry to interrupt, Colonel."
sentences.cn: 图尔金拍拍他的肩膀。“不好意思打断您一下，上校。”

phrases.tran_cn: 对自己的遭遇伤心不平

trans.tran_cn: 对不起的，无价值的，低等的，遗憾的，感到伤心的，后悔
trans.tran_en: feeling ashamed or unhappy about something bad you have done

trans.tran_cn: （道歉时用）很抱歉，请原谅,（请某人重复你没听清的话）你说什么，请再说一遍,（纠正自己说错的话）不对，应该是
